comment.author: 14456531@N07
comment._content: As part of The National Archives Voices of the Armistice series, a podcast is available of Haig's full diary entry for 11 November 1918. Voices of the armistice haig war diary entry 11th november.

comment.author: 24052676@N03
comment._content: So sad that so many lives were lost even as the Armistice had been announced due to bad communication as men were unaware of it.

comment.author: 8492043@N07
comment._content: Given that this transcription is so approximate (about a dozen mistakes in there, at a glance), it's a shame that the original photo is so small. Surely documents containing text should be uploaded at a resolution which makes them easy to read.
